nodes.bodyText:
Does mysql support user defined types?
I think it would be better to have a (case-insensitive?) equality condition on type name rather than contains check
if (jdbcTypeName.equalsIgnoreCase("tinyint unsigned")) {

-- like we do for json

Thanks for the information, it's helpful!
I will update the unit tests with DateType.

@chhsiao90, @losipiuk 's suggestion is even better.
if we do not need to reuse the DataType definitions, we can declare them inline in the test body.
